document.full_text: derrick rose scored 23 points, including the go-ahead layup with 17.8 seconds left, to help the chicago bulls beat the host indiana pacers, 88-84.
document.title: roundup: heat and bulls are within a win of sweeping their first-round opponents
lines_and_colors: derrick rose scored 23 points, including the go-ahead layup with 17.8 seconds left, to help the chicago bulls beat the host indiana pacers, 88-84.
